name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-wikepedia-page
title: Wikipedia Page Prompt
shortDescription: This AI Builder prompt let's you pass in a subject you want to learn more about and it returns a Wikepedia style overview of that subject
longDescription: This AI Builder prompt let's you pass in a subject you want to learn more about and it returns a Wikepedia style overview of that subject

metadata.value: I want you to act as a Wikipedia page. I will give you the name of a topic, and you will provide a summary of that topic in the format of a Wikipedia page. Your summary should be informative and factual, covering the most important aspects of the topic. Start your summary with an introductory paragraph that gives an overview of the topic. [topic]
